alert.note: Alert for Dubois; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 01 at 12:21PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT EDT FRIDAY NIGHT... The officials at the Indiana Department of Environmental Management have called for an Ozone action day on Friday June 2 for the following counties...in effect from 9 AM Friday to midnight EDT Friday night. Dubois Perry Here are some recommended actions that the public can take to reduce ozone forming emissions: * Walk, bike, carpool or use public transportation. * Avoid using the drive-through and combine errands into one trip. * Avoid refueling your vehicle or using gasoline-powered lawn equipment until after 7 PM. * Turn off your engine when idling for more than 30 seconds. * Conserve energy by turning off lights or setting the air conditioner to 75 degrees or above.
